issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Niestety nie potrafię tego odtworzyć.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/206977596-576a7e13-1a33-4e8c-a68a-c08ae691a55a.png)

</details>

Zaktualizuj proszę filtry, potem odśwież stronę za pomocą `Ctrl+F5` (albo wyczyść pamięć podręczną strony), następnie sprawdź proszę ponownie.

comment.body:
С нашими фильтрами не повторяется, сайт открывается.
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры и открыть сайт. Если не поможет, то переустановите расширение.

comment.body: Yes. Looks like your protection does not work at all. This element is blocked by AdGuard Base. I will move this task to another repository.
